attributes.action: Make the Queen pay for her own DIY
attributes.additional_details:
According to the Conservative Govt, despite overwhelming evidence to the contrary (see below) "We're all in it together." If we really are, then asking a fabulously wealthy woman to pay for her home repairs isn't that unreasonable, is it?

Refurbishment/pay rise info:
Guardian.com - http://tinyurl.com/h9tppxz

Royal Wealth Info:
Forbes.com - http://tinyurl.com/zurzbpq
Fortune.com - http://tinyurl.com/hcp9p2y
Republic.org.uk - http://tinyurl.com/z8wv4r3

Living standards, poverty and inequality in the UK - 2016:
Summary: https://www.ifs.org.uk/publications/8371
Full Report: https://www.ifs.org.uk/uploads/publications/comms/R117.pdf
attributes.background:
Government has said that Buckingham Palace needs a £370m refurbishment. Thus, the Queen will get a 66% pay rise increasing her pay to £71M per year. 

If you think giving pay rises to the wealthy when lots of people are struggling under the government's austerity program, please sign.
